content: continue the story later with Clarke and Bellamy loudly arguing at each other over something on the dropship, the argument being intense, Madi wanting to see what's going on, Raven blocking Madi and pleading with her to just let them be, Madi asking why, Raven comforting Madi and going to a soundproof room with her to explain, long dialogue between Raven and Madi, sounds from the argument getting into the soundproof room, Raven and Madi visibly stunned, Raven murmuring under her breath that hasn't happened in a long time, more dialogue between Madi and Raven4 / 4
